member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE
member.summary: The NET_IF_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE enumeration type specifies theNDIS network interface duplex state.

member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE.MediaDuplexStateUnknown
member.summary: The duplex state of the miniport adapter is unknown.

member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE.MediaDuplexStateHalf
member.summary: The miniport adapter can transmit or receive but not both simultaneously.

member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE.MediaDuplexStateFull
member.summary: The miniport adapter can transmit and receive simultaneously.
